com.github.mibac138.argparser.binder

Class Binder

  • com.github.mibac138.argparser.binder.Binder

  • public class Binder

    Common entry point for binding methods. You can initialize methods directly but it's recommended to use these methods when you can

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Binder INSTANCE
      Common entry point for binding methods. You can initialize methods directly but it's recommended to use these methods when you can

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,com.github.mibac138.argparser.binder.Binding> bind(java.lang.Object owner)
      Binds the whole class by scanning for methods with interface BindMethod annotation.
      static BindingImpl bind(java.lang.Object owner, java.lang.reflect.Method method, java.lang.Object defaultValues)
      Binds the given method and returns a interface Binding. To be used with Java code

    • Method Detail

      • bind

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,com.github.mibac138.argparser.binder.Binding> bind(java.lang.Object owner)

        Binds the whole class by scanning for methods with interface BindMethod annotation.

        Returns:
        map with BindMethod.name as keys and binding as the bound methods
        See Also:
        interface BindMethod

      • bind

                               java.lang.reflect.Method method,
                               java.lang.Object defaultValues)

        Binds the given method and returns a interface Binding. To be used with Java code

        See Also:
        interface Binding

      • bind

        public static Binding bind(kotlin.reflect.KCallable<?> method,
                           java.lang.Object owner)

        Binds the given method and returns a interface Binding.

        Parameters:
        owner - use this if your method isn't bound. (For more info what bound means in this context refer to link)
        See Also:
        interface Binding
